original: intros p Hp b a H. intros [x Hx]. unfold rem. rewrite rem_plus. rewrite rem_plus_rem. rewrite rem_plus_rem. rewrite rem_plus. rewrite rem_mult_rem. rewrite rem_mult_rem. rewrite rem_plus. rewrite rem_mult_rem. rewrite rem_mult_rem. rewrite Hx. rewrite H. apply Nat.add_mod_idemp_l. apply Hp.
